## May 10, 2021
```{r cars, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)

stateInc <- data.frame(State = state.abb, Pop = as.vector(state.x77[,1]),Income = as.vector(state.x77[,2]))
stateInc$hover <- with(stateInc, paste(State, '<br>', "Population:", Pop, "\n", "Income (Per Capita):", Income ))
borders <- list(color = toRGB("blue"))
mapOptions <- list(
    scope = "usa",
    projection = list(type = "albers usa"),
    showlakes = TRUE,
    lakecolor = toRGB("white")
)

plot_ly(stateInc, z = stateInc$Income, text = stateInc$hover, locations = stateInc$State, type = "choropleth", locationmode = "USA-states", color = stateInc$Income, colorscale = "Viridis",  marker = list(line = borders)) %>% layout(title = "US Income in 1974", geo = mapOptions)

```
